txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.

Wanted: Bent claws from the toads surrounding Frogmorton in the Shire. Bounders are looking for proof of those who are assisting them in keeping the Shire safe. Deliver the items to Hal Hornblower at Hobbiton centre.

'Did you happen to see Lobelia when you were getting these. Oh mercy, not of the Sackville-Bagginses... the toad! Oh never you mind now, I'll be uninvited from her party for certain if anyone overheard that conversation.\n\n'Thank you, kindly.'
'I have seen the toads near Frogmorton; lazy things growing fat on midges and sickle-flies.'
Hal Hornblower wants bent claws. Hal can be found near the stable in the centre of Hobbiton.
Deliver the bent claws to Hal Hornblower in Hobbiton
You have accepted a task to acquire bent claws for the bounders of the Shire. They have deputized Hal Hornblower to collect the items near the stables in Hobbiton.
Wanted: Bent claws from the toads surrounding Frogmorton in the Shire.
